statements: SELECT * FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT location_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT location_id, location_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) AS average_pollution_level FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data ORDER BY location_name DESC, pollution_level ASC;
SELECT location_name, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution_level FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY location_name HAVING AVG(pollution_level) > 50 ORDER BY avg_pollution_level DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 100 ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level, MIN(pollution_level) AS min_pollution_level FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name FROM air_quality_data ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollutant_level > 50 ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollutant_type = 'PM2.5' ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM pollution_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM pollution_locations ORDER BY latitude DESC, longitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollutant_type='PM2.5' AND pollutant_level > 20 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE location_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY pollutant_level DESC;
SELECT location_name, pollutant_type, AVG(pollutant_level) AS avg_pollutant_level FROM air_quality_data GROUP BY location_name HAVING AVG(pollutant_level) > 15;

SELECT a.location_name, a.pollutant_type, p.pollution_level FROM air_quality_data a JOIN pollution_locations p ON a.location_id = p.location_id WHERE p.pollution_level > 30 ORDER BY a.location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%' OR location_name LIKE 'San%' ORDER BY location_name ASC, pollutant_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data
SELECT location_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT city FROM location_info WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM pollution_sources WHERE pollution_factor > 0.5
SELECT location_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level < 50
SELECT location_name, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data
SELECT city, country FROM location_info
SELECT * FROM pollution_sources WHERE pollution_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY source_id DESC
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM pollution_sources WHERE source_type LIKE '%vehicle%'
SELECT location_id, city, pollution_factor FROM location_info JOIN pollution_sources ON location_info.location_id = pollution_sources.source_id
SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements;
SELECT location_name, postcode FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM pollution_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT measurement_id, pollution_level FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT effect_name, health_impact FROM pollution_effects WHERE health_impact LIKE '%serious%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY measurement_id ASC
SELECT location_name, postcode FROM locations WHERE location_id = 3
SELECT source_name FROM pollution_sources WHERE source_type = 'Industrial'
SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements INNER JOIN locations ON air_quality_measurements.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE location_name = 'New York' ORDER BY measurement_id DESC
SELECT effect_name, health_impact FROM pollution_effects
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data;
SELECT location_name, pollutant_type FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT source_name, source_type, location_name FROM pollution_sources JOIN air_quality_data ON pollution_sources.location_id = air_quality_data.location_id;
SELECT effect_name, impact_description FROM pollution_effects WHERE length(impact_description) > 100;
SELECT reading_date, reading_value FROM pollution_readings ORDER BY reading_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_data ORDER BY location_name DESC, pollutant_type ASC
SELECT location_name, pollutant_type, pollution_level FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY pollution_level DESC
SELECT p.source_name, p.source_type, a.location_name FROM pollution_sources p INNER JOIN air_quality_data a ON p.location_id = a.location_id
SELECT effect_name, impact_description FROM pollution_effects WHERE effect_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY effect_id

SELECT pr.reading_value, pr.reading_date, ad.location_name FROM pollution_readings pr INNER JOIN air_quality_data ad ON pr.location_id = ad.location_id WHERE reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_value DESC
